title: Monstrous Menagerie
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Monstrous menagerie.png](/images/0/0a/Monstrous_menagerie.png)](/File:Monstrous_menagerie.png) Monstrous Menagerie |                                                    |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                                                 | 7                                                  |
| School1                                                                                                               | [Summoning](/Summonings "Summonings")              |
| Source(s)                                                                                                             | [Book of Beasts](/Book_of_Beasts "Book of Beasts") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                           | 5                                                  |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                             | 0                                                  |
| Power Cap                                                                                                             | 200                                                |
| Flags                                                                                                                 | Mons abjure                                        |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Summons a powerful exotic creature to the caster's aid: a manticore, a lindwurm, or, at high power, even a sphinx. Casting the spell at higher power also increases the strength of the beasts themselves. |

**Monstrous Menagerie** is a level 7 [Summoning](/Summonings "Summonings") spell which summons an exotic, ranged creature.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 Monster Version](#Monster_Version)
- [4 History](#History)
- [5 References](#References)

## Useful Info

One beast is summoned. Possible summons include:

- H [![Manticore.png](/images/0/03/Manticore.png)](/File:Manticore.png) **[Manticore](/Manticore "Manticore")**
- k [![Lindwurm.png](/images/8/85/Lindwurm.png)](/File:Lindwurm.png) **[Lindwurm](/Lindwurm "Lindwurm")**
- H [![Sphinx.png](/images/0/0e/Sphinx.png)](/File:Sphinx.png) **[Sphinx](/Sphinx "Sphinx")**

Higher [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power") increases a chance to summon a [sphinx](/Sphinx "Sphinx"), and boosts the strength of the creature.

- Chance of a sphinx is equal to `(1 - 61 / <power>) / 2`.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Otherwise, there's an equal chance of a manticore or lindwurm.
- Summoned monsters gain from 0 to 6 additional [HD](/HD "HD") based on spell power. The summon gains `(<power> - 50) / 25` HD, rounded in a weighted fashion.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

Duration of the summons is around 36 turns; it does not depend on the spell power.

There is a summon limit of 2; additional summons will cause the oldest to very quickly time out.

## Strategy

The most standard of the level 7 Summonings spells. All monsters from this spell can attack from range, a distinct advantage compared to the lower level summons. Having a summon cap of 2 is also nice.

## Monster Version

The monster version functions like the player version, except no HD bonus is given to the summoned creatures.

The following enemies cast Monstrous Menagerie:

- @ [![Kirke.png](/images/4/41/Kirke.png)](/File:Kirke.png) **[Kirke](/Kirke "Kirke")**

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), Monstrous Menagerie had a summon cap of 4.
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), Monstrous Menagerie could summon 1-3 harpies.
- Prior to [0.22](/0.22 "0.22"), for followers of [Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos"), lindwurms were replaced by manticores.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Monstrous Menagerie was a level 6 spell.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), this spell was found in the [Book of Beasts](/Book_of_Beasts "Book of Beasts") and [Book of Summonings](/Book_of_Summonings "Book of Summonings"), but not the [Grand Grimoire](/Grand_Grimoire "Grand Grimoire").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), this spell had a summon cap of 5.
- Monstrous Menagerie was added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [spl-summoning.cc:233](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.0/crawl-ref/source/spl-summoning.cc#L233) (0.30.0)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [spl-summoning.cc:241](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.0/crawl-ref/source/spl-summoning.cc#L241) (0.30.0)

Monstrous Menagerie

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Monstrous Menagerie
Level 7
School1 Summoning
Source(s) Book of Beasts
Casting noise 5
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 200
Flags Mons abjure
Summons a powerful exotic creature to the caster's aid: a manticore, a lindwurm, or, at high power, even a sphinx. Casting the spell at higher power also increases the strength of the beasts themselves.

Monstrous Menagerie is a level 7 Summoning spell which summons an exotic, ranged creature.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 Monster Version
  • 4 History
  • 5 References

Useful Info

One beast is summoned. Possible summons include:

  • H Manticore
  • k Lindwurm
  • H Sphinx

Higher spell power increases a chance to summon a sphinx, and boosts the strength of the creature.

  • Chance of a sphinx is equal to (1 - 61 / <power>) / 2.[1] Otherwise, there's an equal chance of a manticore or lindwurm.
  • Summoned monsters gain from 0 to 6 additional HD based on spell power. The summon gains (<power> - 50) / 25 HD, rounded in a weighted fashion.[2]

Duration of the summons is around 36 turns; it does not depend on the spell power.

There is a summon limit of 2; additional summons will cause the oldest to very quickly time out.

Strategy

The most standard of the level 7 Summonings spells. All monsters from this spell can attack from range, a distinct advantage compared to the lower level summons. Having a summon cap of 2 is also nice.

Monster Version

The monster version functions like the player version, except no HD bonus is given to the summoned creatures.

The following enemies cast Monstrous Menagerie:

  • @ Kirke

History

  • Prior to 0.28, Monstrous Menagerie had a summon cap of 4.
  • Prior to 0.27, Monstrous Menagerie could summon 1-3 harpies.
  • Prior to 0.22, for followers of Dithmenos, lindwurms were replaced by manticores.
  • Prior to 0.18, Monstrous Menagerie was a level 6 spell.
  • Prior to 0.17, this spell was found in the Book of Beasts and Book of Summonings, but not the Grand Grimoire.
  • Prior to 0.16, this spell had a summon cap of 5.
  • Monstrous Menagerie was added in 0.14.

References

  1. ↑ spl-summoning.cc:233 (0.30.0)
  2. ↑ spl-summoning.cc:241 (0.30.0)
